name: cuff
content:
cuff noun [C]
(AROUND WRIST, ANKLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the thicker material at the end of a sleeve closest to the hand: He buttoned his cuffs. a black shirt with white cuffs
Tooga/The Image Bank/GettyImages
US (UK turn-up) a part at the end of a trouser leg that is turned up: He wears a polo shirt and cuffs on his pants.
Image Source/GettyImages
a piece of jewellery for wearing around the wrist, made from a wide circle of metal, plastic, or other material: She wore a simple black dress with a beautiful diamond cuff.
Fruit_Cocktail/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages cuffs [ plural ]
informal for
handcuffs : They put him in cuffs.
